actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-447.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1904) to extend and improve the provisions of the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act and the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment and Adoption Reform Act of 1978.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1904 (child abuse prevention and treatment).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1904) to extend and improve the provisions of the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act and the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment and Adoption Reform Act of 1978.
